entry.title: Test
entry.content:
Testing, one two one two.

Trolls in a tantrum cause terrible trouble.

``` coffeescript Coffeescript Tricks start:51 mark:52,54-55

Given an alphabet:

alphabet = ‘abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz’

Iterate over part of the alphabet:

console.log letter for letter in alphabet[4..8] ```

``` scala Discover if a number is prime http://www.noulakaz.net/weblog/2007/03/18/a-regular-expression-to-check-for-prime-numbers/ Source Article class Fixnum def prime?

('1' * self) !~ /^1?$|^(11+?)\1+$/

end end ```
